alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 1:55PM EST until January 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 and Maple Street near the Red River Ranch are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued 9 PM EST.
